storyInfo: Nian and Dusk reach a mysterious summit somewhere, seemingly in search of someone. Meanwhile, the innkeeper returns home for his blade, in order to duel the pole-carrier. The boatman tells an old legend of three mountains, and everyone is soon to converge on the Field of Forgotten Water.

attributes.content: In one or two more branches' time, the color of dusk will paint the sky.
These are the Three Mounts and Seventeen Peaks, though which mount this is, or which peak, is a mystery.
The only thing known is that a pavilion sits atop, Shangshu's scenery both past and present visible from within, beauty unparalleled.
Yet regrettably, this pavilion is currently deserted, and so no one is there to see it.
And on that note, people have come.
Well, here's the place.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: What? That depressed about meeting her?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: She gets on my nerves.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: She's not gonna bug you.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: That's why she gets on my nerves.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: ...*Sigh*.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: She's our big sister either way. Let's straighten up.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: She's not even here.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Nope, she isn't. Why not?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: With all the fuss down below... taking cover up here in the ranges does kind of smell like her style.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: How come when I hide you call me a recluse, but when she does it you're like this?!
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Hey... it's not like she's always trying to hide.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: She's just tipsy and worn out, looking for a nice crag splitting the drifting clouds to lie down on, knocking out for a moment. That's not so bad.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Grr. This is discrimination.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Pull the other one.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I just hope she doesn't cause any trouble for us.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: She's always half-drunk, half-asleep, half-awake. It's those people who'll come give us trouble.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Yeah, real nice how she can sleep through this. Is she even able to?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Say, what'cha think she dreams of?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I don't know. Don't ask me.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Heaven knows where her mind wanders. She'll come back on her own once she's bored, in any case.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: I hear this peak's apparently meant to be wrecked.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Wonder how hard Kroos and the Nothing guy'll have to work finding this summit at all.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Sir, what do you have there?
attributes.name: Inn Assistant

attributes.content: What comes will come, trouble and all.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: You bumped into Shang?
attributes.name: Inn Assistant

attributes.content: Yes. He stole the cup.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: That bastard! How does one man be so single-minded—!
attributes.name: Inn Assistant

attributes.content: Leave it. This whole thing is a mess.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Heh, good swords always keep the rust away.
attributes.name: Inn Assistant

attributes.content: Been years since I saw you draw it, sir.
attributes.name: Inn Assistant

attributes.content: Blades are ruthless things. Best put to use slicing melons and chopping greens.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: But if I want my business handed smoothly over to my darling Ye, then I have to settle things with Shang Zhong eventually.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Old Shang might be muddled in the head, but he's not the good-for-nothing who'd harass the Miss about paying her father's debts.
attributes.name: Inn Assistant

attributes.content: Sir, you still won't step over that final line, will you?
attributes.name: Inn Assistant

attributes.content: What kind of person could?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: One storm, two lives. It was my mistake that let his son die. He has a grudge against me I can't argue with.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: I know more than anyone how he's felt all these years.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Sir...
attributes.name: Inn Assistant

attributes.content: Relax. I'll get the cup back, at the very least.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: If I don't, I won't have anything to report.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Master Shen—isn't there any way to get up the mountains a little quicker?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: In a sense, but for people who've never taken the mountain passes before, it might be...
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: You're fine, I'm used to this.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Alright, then. This way.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Ao—!
attributes.name: Waregeist

attributes.content: Gah. What's the deal with these things?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Hey! Lee!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: I'm fighting for you here! Is this any place to space out?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: ...I'm fine.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Pull it together. I don't know why these things keep mobbing us, and we've lost the Blacknight lady and the pole-carrier by now.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Why aren't you, I don't know, hurrying it up?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: No rush, now, no rush.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: When I accept a friend's request, I see it through. It's just...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: We need to find a favorable pavilion near very favorable water for it.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Huff...
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: (At such a young age, her agility is nearly unimaginable...)
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Such a steep pass, and you're not even gasping for air yet.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Have you been crossing mountains all your life?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Only got into the habit the last couple of years...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: And I'm Rim Billiton-born. Might not be quite the Yan style, but it's a life on the wilder side anyhow.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I see.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: The passes around these summits are all hard to traverse. They always said in olden times that Shu's paths tried you. People argue which ones that meant, but it's all of them, in truth.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Master Shen, you think there's a reason Mr. Lee told us to find him at Qujiang Peak?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: When he was looking into the goblet's origins for Mr. Liang, the first place he said he'd head for was Qujiang Peak.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: And he asked for 'Zuanjiang Peak.' Only a few locals know that old name; the authorities changed it however many years ago. I was baffled how he even knew it.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Maybe Mr. Lee found some kind of lead on it...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: He did have a lead. He said, he dreamt of it.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: I assumed he was hiding something, using that reason to parry me, so I didn't follow up... If he really did see it in his dreams, then that's all more curious.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Hmm... Qujiang Peak is a high and treacherous one. It gets the least tourists. It's all the more peaceful here, compared to the well-inhabited Nini Peak with its gentle flat paths, or Shuzhou Peak covered with old theater byways.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: You've seen... the few small villages, buildings left, are all left over from long, long ago.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Though...
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Is there some other hint?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Though... when Qujiang Peak was still called Zuanjiang Peak, atop this region of mountain, there was actually another peak.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: It and Zuanjiang together were called the 'Twin Peaks High as the Sun,' the two most majestic prominences of the Three Mounts and Eighteen Peaks.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: And this peak had countless cliffs, the steepest parts almost vertical, like a stone sword against the heavens when you looked from afar. It was a magnificent sight.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: If you watched from any other peak at sunset, it was as if the sun fell straight on it, as if someone ran it through by their blade.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Sadly, later there was a massive Catastrophe, like fire and storm linking hands, and the terrain around here was scarred well. Most of that swordlike peak collapsed and crumbled. That was thirty years ago, now.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: You can pull aside any Shangshuite on the street of at least some age, and they could all tell you clear and cleanly of the marvel of those black clouds weighing on the city.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: I regret I wasn't eking my living on this river yet then. I never got to see it with my own eyes.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: A Catastrophe... And Shangshuites'd call it a marvel?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: It's a strange thing. It came without the slightest warning. By the time the Imperial Astronomers got the warning out telling the villages nearby to evacuate, it was already barely manageable. There should've been no escape from it...
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: But ultimately, thunder clapped and the storm faded, and apart from a few lightly battered houses, all the residences in the mountains suffered not a single bit of damage, and not one person was afflicted. That was the first wonder.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Afterwards, the Tumu tianshi came to inspect the altered mountain terrain. Normally, with a wondrous peak collapsing like that, there should be visible traces left.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: But apart from half of the rocky 'hilt' left next to Qujiang Peak, not a single chunk of boulder or sign of the landslide was found. That was the second wonder.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: What caused any of that, nobody knows. There's just some wild rumors, barely worth trusting.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Never thought something like that happened in Shangshu before...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Yan's history and its legends have always blended together.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Like how some rumors say Shangshu's birth was to do with the lands in ancient people's dreams. The factual matter of things is beyond anyone's research powers, now.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: The peak that disappeared—what was its name?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: The sunseeker. Xunri Peak.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: But Yan's development has flown by. I fear to the younger generation, things that happened thirty years ago wouldn't be worth the time, being so far in the past.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Stay still—!
attributes.name: Uphill Voice

attributes.content: —Who's that?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: (Rim Billitonian) Stone the flamin' fowlbeasts!- Light, keep it from buggering off!
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Wrrrr—! Aoww—!
attributes.name: Waregeist

attributes.content: (Rim Billitonian) You just—settle down, love—!
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: —Wwrr!
attributes.name: Waregeist

attributes.content: Is she... trying to catch that thing?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Seems like it...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: (Rim Billitonian) Crikey, just like that, keep it bound tight, eyes glued to it!
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: (Rim Billitonian) You a Rim Billy, then?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: (Rim Billitonian) Now, quit muckin' about... we're only...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: (Rim Billitonian) Ya wouldn't be Yanese just lookin' at ya.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Aoww—!
attributes.name: Waregeist

attributes.content: (Rim Billitonian) —Oi help us out. Hrgh! Hey take a squiz at this and lemme know what kinda animal this is?
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: (Rim Billitonian) It's... some Originium Arts creation-type.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: (Rim Billitonian) Originium Arts? Like those stunts the Leithanian lord boys pull? You revvin my cylinder? Had me thinkin' it was some Yan critter I could tame...
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: (Rim Billitonian) Which galah went and made these things up...?! Light! Just let it go, it's as useful as an ashtray on a bike!
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: (Rim Billitonian) We're looking for their owner, too. Whadyareckon?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: (Rim Billitonian) I...
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: (Rim Billitonian) You a Messenger's guard? Bounty hunter?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: (Rim Billitonian) No sense in shootin' a hound if it's gone into the neighbors paddock, wanna work together on this?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: (Rim Billitonian) I don't know you from Bruce, mate, so don't think I'm gonna trust ya
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: (Rim Billitonian) A Billy, though.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: (Rim Billitonian) Not every one of them's so nice.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: (Rim Billitonian) That's a dead shame, then...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: (Rim Billitonian) But getting to meet a Billitonian out here's still got me gobsmacked
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: (Rim Billitonian) Hooroo. See you round like a boomerang, Cautus.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Your countryman?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Suppose so... can't shake this dodgy feeling...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Ah, whatever. How far left to the summit, Master Shen?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: A road this wide, and you two can't move aside?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Tough.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: What does a mandarin want with me?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Master Shang. Do you have any idea what that thing on your belt is?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Is it yours?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Yes and no, but we hope you'll hand it to us.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: How do you know me?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: We've heard some rumors.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Hoh. What did Zheng Qingyue tell you?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: If your first reaction is to think of Sir Zheng, then presumably you know where we came from?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The Sui Regulator's Candleholders.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: But you're so young... You're one I've never met before.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: If you're aware of our rank, why don't you give up the cup?
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Me and Zheng Qingyue need to settle things.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: But it seems like those things and the item at your waist are unrelated.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: My son died for this goblet. How could I be unrelated?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Wrwwrr...
attributes.name: Waregeist

attributes.content: Fine ability, for one so young. These animals almost seem to fear you.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: We ask only your cooperation.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: What if I say no? Will you rob me in the open?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: I imagine you'll find absolutely no purpose in this cup.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: But to we of the Sui Regulator, the cup has tremendous use.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: What use?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Bait.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: For what?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Those who bring ruin to the nation and its people.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Yan has known peace for centuries. Where did criminals like those come from?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: That's need-to-know.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: However, we ask you to believe us. Entrust the goblet to us, and you'll have done a justice great as the heavens.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Hah! A justice... For someone of my sort, it'd mean too little, and be more than I deserve.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Move aside.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: I fear that's not for you to decide, Master Shang.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: This goblet is to be buried with my son. Zheng Qingyue must come in person...
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Otherwise, keep shut!
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: I'll wait for him, at the Field of Forgotten Water on Qujiang Peak!
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Ingrate!
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: —A staff fighter?
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Oh—good, strong might. You have some force, old bull.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Lord Zuo, this man hides his talents. No good lies in him.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Get the goods before anything! Don't let him keep you!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Did you ever hear from Zheng Qingyue the words I hate most?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Don't fool with us!
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: —They're 'save the goods, then the men.'
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier
